properties.description: The pipeline that orchestrates the staging and loading of the data from the delta change data feed to the Synapse dedicate pool tables.

activities.name: Filter - Deletes
activities.description: Filter ChangeTypesArray parameter to tables that have delete as a change type.

activities.name: Filter - Update
activities.description: Filter ChangeTypesArray parameter to tables that have updates as a change type.

activities.name: Filter - Insert
activities.description: Filter ChangeTypesArray parameter to tables that have insert as a change type.

activities.name: Filter - Full Load
activities.description: Loop through tables that had full_load changes to the records.

activities.name: ForEach - Pool - Deletes
activities.description: Loop through tables that had delete changes to the records. The pipeline is at the table grain already but the loop is a way to separate and wrap the different steps.

activities.name: Get Resource Class Required
activities.description: Profile the data that was loaded into the staging table and get determine the minimum static resource that should be used to load the data.

activities.name: Create Staging Table DDL - Serverless
activities.description: Profile the data using the Synapse serverless engine and generate the optimal table DDL.

activities.name: Create Staging Tables
activities.description: Execute the DDL for the creation of the staging table from the previous step in the Synapse dedicated pool.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('EXECUTE AS user = ''Userstaticrc10'' '
, activity('Create Staging Table DDL - Serverless').output.value[0].CreateTableDDL, '; SELECT 1 AS a')

activities.name: Execute COPY INTO Staging Statement
activities.description: Execute the COPY INTO statement to move the data from ADLS to the newly created staging table.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('EXECUTE AS user = ''Userstaticrc10'' COPY INTO ['
, pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['SchemaName'], '].[', pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['TableName'], '_delete'
, '] FROM '''
, pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['SynapseSync_https'], '/', pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['SynapseWorkspaceName'], '_', pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['PoolName'], '_SynapseLakehouseSync/', pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['SchemaName'], '/', pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['TableName']
, '/_change_type=delete'
, ''' WITH ( FILE_TYPE = ''PARQUET'', MAXERRORS = 0, COMPRESSION = ''snappy'', IDENTITY_INSERT = ''OFF'', CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY = ''Managed Identity'')) OPTION (LABEL = ''COPY - ['
, pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['SchemaName'], '].[', pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['TableName'], '_delete', '] - '
, pipeline().parameters.PipelineValue[0].PipelineRunId, ''');SELECT 1 AS a')

activities.name: Script - Delete
activities.description: Execute the delete statement on the final table from the data that was staged.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat(replace(replace(replace(replace(variables('sqlDelete')
,'{SchemaName}', pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['SchemaName'])
,'{TableName}', pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['TableName'])
,'{UserName}', activity('Get Resource Class Required').output.firstRow.UserName)
,'{KeyColumns}', pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['KeyColumns'])
,' SELECT 1 AS a'
)

activities.name: Create Final Tables - Auto Distribution and Index
activities.description: Run the CTAS command to load the data from the staging table to the final table with the appropriate distribution and index defined.

activities.name: Drop Table if Exists
activities.description: Drop the staging table if it exists in Synapse dedicated pool.

activities.name: ForEach - Drop Temp Tables
activities.description: If the DropTableFlag parameter is true, then drop the staging tables that are created during the loading process after the data has been loaded. This will keep the Synapse Dedicated Pool clean.

dependsOn.activity: ForEach - Create and Load the Synapse Table

activities.name: Log Row Count - SynapseLakehouseSync
activities.description: Log the row count for the table in the logging.SynapseLakehouseSyncRecordCount logging table.

dependsOn.activity: ForEach - Create and Load the Synapse Table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('EXECUTE AS USER = ''Userstaticrc10''; 
DECLARE @RowInsertDateTime DATETIME2(0) = GETDATE()
    ,@TableRowCountSynapse BIGINT = (SELECT COUNT_BIG(*) FROM ', pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['SchemaName'], '.', pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['TableName'], ')
INSERT logging.SynapseLakehouseSync (PoolName, SchemaName, TableName, TableRowCountADLS, TableRowCountSynapse, DeltaDataADLSFullPath, SynapseSyncDataADLSFullPath, RowInsertDateTime)
VALUES (
''', pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['PoolName'],''',
''', pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['SchemaName'],''',
''', pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['TableName'],''',
', pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['TableRowCountADLS'], 
', @TableRowCountSynapse, '''
, pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['DeltaDataADLSFullPath'], ''', '''
, pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput['SynapseSyncDataADLSFullPath'], '''
, @RowInsertDateTime)
; 

SELECT @TableRowCountSynapse AS TableRowCountSynapse
')

activities.name: Add TableRowCountSynapse to Json Object
activities.description: Add the TableRowCountSynapse a json object.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('
DECLARE @json NVARCHAR(MAX) = '''
, string(pipeline().parameters.DatabricksOutput)
, ''' 

;WITH cte AS
(
	SELECT PoolName, SynapseWorkspaceName, SynapseLakehouseSyncKey, ', activity('Log Row Count - SynapseLakehouseSync').output.value[0].TableRowCountSynapse, ' AS TableRowCountSynapse
		,SynapseSyncDataADLSFullPath
	FROM OPENJSON(@json)
	WITH
	(
		PoolName NVARCHAR(1000) ''$.PoolName''
		,SynapseWorkspaceName NVARCHAR(1000) ''$.SynapseWorkspaceName''
		,SynapseLakehouseSyncKey NVARCHAR(1000) ''$.SynapseLakehouseSyncKey''
		,SynapseSyncDataADLSFullPath NVARCHAR(1000) ''$.SynapseSyncDataADLSFullPath''
	)
)
SELECT *, (SELECT * FROM cte FOR JSON AUTO, WITHOUT_ARRAY_WRAPPER) AS JsonString
FROM cte
')

activities.name: Spark - Synapse Lakehouse Sync Log Success
activities.description: Call the Azure Databricks notebook to log in the _SynapseLakehouseSync delta table that the data was loaded successfully into Synapse.

notebook.referenceName: Synapse Lakehouse Sync Tracking Table Log Success

GetResourceClass.defaultValue: DECLARE @DWU VARCHAR(8) 	,@SCHEMA_NAME VARCHAR(128) = '{SchemaNameStaging}' 	,@TABLE_NAME VARCHAR(128) = '{TableNameStaging}' 	,@Optmial_Resource_Class VARCHAR(100) 	,@Set_Resource_Class VARCHAR(1000)  SELECT @DWU = 'DW' + CAST(CASE  			WHEN Mem > 4 				THEN Nodes * 500 			ELSE Mem * 100 			END AS VARCHAR(10)) + 'c' FROM ( 	SELECT Nodes = count(DISTINCT n.pdw_node_id) /*,Mem=max(i.committed_target_kb/1000/1000/60)*/ 		,Mem = CAST(max(i.committed_target_kb / 1000.0 / 1000 / 60) AS DECIMAL(10, 0)) 	FROM sys.dm_pdw_nodes n 	CROSS APPLY sys.dm_pdw_nodes_os_sys_info i 	WHERE type = 'COMPUTE' 	) AS A  IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ref') IS NOT NULL BEGIN 	DROP TABLE #ref; END;  CREATE TABLE #ref 	WITH (DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN) AS WITH alloc AS ( 		SELECT 'DW100c' AS DWU 			,4 AS max_queries 			,4 AS max_slots 			,1 AS slots_used_smallrc 			,1 AS slots_used_mediumrc 			,2 AS slots_used_largerc 			,4 AS slots_used_xlargerc 			,1 AS slots_used_staticrc10 			,2 AS slots_used_staticrc20 			,4 AS slots_used_staticrc30 			,4 AS slots_used_staticrc40 			,4 AS slots_used_staticrc50 			,4 AS slots_used_staticrc60 			,4 AS slots_used_staticrc70 			,4 AS slots_used_staticrc80 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'DW200c' 			,8 			,8 			,1 			,2 			,4 			,8 			,1 			,2 			,4 			,8 			,8 			,8 			,8 			,8 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'DW300c' 			,12 			,12 			,1 			,2 			,4 			,8 			,1 			,2 			,4 			,8 			,8 			,8 			,8 			,8 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'DW400c' 			,16 			,16 			,1 			,4 			,8 			,16 			,1 			,2 			,4 			,8 			,16 			,16 			,16 			,16 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'DW500c' 			,20 			,20 			,1 			,4 			,8 			,16 			,1 			,2 			,4 			,8 			,16 			,16 			,16 			,16 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'DW1000c' 			,32 			,40 			,1 			,4 			,8 			,28 			,1 			,2 			,4 			,8 			,16 			,32 			,32 			,32 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'DW1500c' 			,32 			,60 			,1 			,6 			,13 			,42 			,1 			,2 			,4 			,8 			,16 			,32 			,32 			,32 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'DW2000c' 			,48 			,80 			,2 			,8 			,17 			,56 			,1 			,2 			,4 			,8 			,16 			,32 			,64 			,64 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'DW2500c' 			,48 			,100 			,3 			,10 			,22 			,70 			,1 			,2 			,4 			,8 			,16 			,32 			,64 			,64 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'DW3000c' 			,64 			,120 			,3 			,12 			,26 			,84 			,1 			,2 			,4 			,8 			,16 			,32 			,64 			,64 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'DW5000c' 			,64 			,200 			,6 			,20 			,44 			,140 			,1 			,2 			,4 			,8 			,16 			,32 			,64 			,128 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'DW6000c' 			,128 			,240 			,7 			,24 			,52 			,168 			,1 			,2 			,4 			,8 			,16 			,32 			,64 			,128 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'DW7500c' 			,128 			,300 			,9 			,30 			,66 			,210 			,1 			,2 			,4 			,8 			,16 			,32 			,64 			,128 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'DW10000c' 			,128 			,400 			,12 			,40 			,88 			,280 			,1 			,2 			,4 			,8 			,16 			,32 			,64 			,128 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'DW15000c' 			,128 			,600 			,18 			,60 			,132 			,420 			,1 			,2 			,4 			,8 			,16 			,32 			,64 			,128 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'DW30000c' 			,128 			,1200 			,36 			,120 			,264 			,840 			,1 			,2 			,4 			,8 			,16 			,32 			,64 			,128 		) 	,map AS ( 		SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), 'SloDWGroupSmall') AS wg_name 			,slots_used_smallrc AS slots_used 		FROM alloc 		WHERE DWU = @DWU 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), 'SloDWGroupMedium') AS wg_name 			,slots_used_mediumrc AS slots_used 		FROM alloc 		WHERE DWU = @DWU 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), 'SloDWGroupLarge') AS wg_name 			,slots_used_largerc AS slots_used 		FROM alloc 		WHERE DWU = @DWU 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), 'SloDWGroupXLarge') AS wg_name 			,slots_used_xlargerc AS slots_used 		FROM alloc 		WHERE DWU = @DWU 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'SloDWGroupC00' 			,1 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'SloDWGroupC01' 			,2 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'SloDWGroupC02' 			,4 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'SloDWGroupC03' 			,8 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'SloDWGroupC04' 			,16 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'SloDWGroupC05' 			,32 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'SloDWGroupC06' 			,64 		 		UNION ALL 		 		SELECT 'SloDWGroupC07' 			,128 		) 	,ref AS ( 		SELECT a1.* 			,m1.wg_name AS wg_name_smallrc 			,m1.slots_used * 250 AS tgt_mem_grant_MB_smallrc 			,m2.wg_name AS wg_name_mediumrc 			,m2.slots_used * 250 AS tgt_mem_grant_MB_mediumrc 			,m3.wg_name AS wg_name_largerc 			,m3.slots_used * 250 AS tgt_mem_grant_MB_largerc 			,m4.wg_name AS wg_name_xlargerc 			,m4.slots_used * 250 AS tgt_mem_grant_MB_xlargerc 			,m5.wg_name AS wg_name_staticrc10 			,m5.slots_used * 250 AS tgt_mem_grant_MB_staticrc10 			,m6.wg_name AS wg_name_staticrc20 			,m6.slots_used * 250 AS tgt_mem_grant_MB_staticrc20 			,m7.wg_name AS wg_name_staticrc30 			,m7.slots_used * 250 AS tgt_mem_grant_MB_staticrc30 			,m8.wg_name AS wg_name_staticrc40 			,m8.slots_used * 250 AS tgt_mem_grant_MB_staticrc40 			,m9.wg_name AS wg_name_staticrc50 			,m9.slots_used * 250 AS tgt_mem_grant_MB_staticrc50 			,m10.wg_name AS wg_name_staticrc60 			,m10.slots_used * 250 AS tgt_mem_grant_MB_staticrc60 			,m11.wg_name AS wg_name_staticrc70 			,m11.slots_used * 250 AS tgt_mem_grant_MB_staticrc70 			,m12.wg_name AS wg_name_staticrc80 			,m12.slots_used * 250 AS tgt_mem_grant_MB_staticrc80 		FROM alloc a1 		JOIN map m1 ON a1.slots_used_smallrc = m1.slots_used 			AND m1.wg_name = 'SloDWGroupSmall' 		JOIN map m2 ON a1.slots_used_mediumrc = m2.slots_used 			AND m2.wg_name = 'SloDWGroupMedium' 		JOIN map m3 ON a1.slots_used_largerc = m3.slots_used 			AND m3.wg_name = 'SloDWGroupLarge' 		JOIN map m4 ON a1.slots_used_xlargerc = m4.slots_used 			AND m4.wg_name = 'SloDWGroupXLarge' 		JOIN map m5 ON a1.slots_used_staticrc10 = m5.slots_used 			AND m5.wg_name NOT IN ( 				'SloDWGroupSmall' 				,'SloDWGroupMedium' 				,'SloDWGroupLarge' 				,'SloDWGroupXLarge' 				) 		JOIN map m6 ON a1.slots_used_staticrc20 = m6.slots_used 			AND m6.wg_name NOT IN ( 				'SloDWGroupSmall' 				,'SloDWGroupMedium' 				,'SloDWGroupLarge' 				,'SloDWGroupXLarge' 				) 		JOIN map m7 ON a1.slots_used_staticrc30 = m7.slots_used 			AND m7.wg_name NOT IN ( 				'SloDWGroupSmall' 				,'SloDWGroupMedium' 				,'SloDWGroupLarge' 				,'SloDWGroupXLarge' 				) 		JOIN map m8 ON a1.slots_used_staticrc40 = m8.slots_used 			AND m8.wg_name NOT IN ( 				'SloDWGroupSmall' 				,'SloDWGroupMedium' 				,'SloDWGroupLarge' 				,'SloDWGroupXLarge' 				) 		JOIN map m9 ON a1.slots_used_staticrc50 = m9.slots_used 			AND m9.wg_name NOT IN ( 				'SloDWGroupSmall' 				,'SloDWGroupMedium' 				,'SloDWGroupLarge' 				,'SloDWGroupXLarge' 				) 		JOIN map m10 ON a1.slots_used_staticrc60 = m10.slots_used 			AND m10.wg_name NOT IN ( 				'SloDWGroupSmall' 				,'SloDWGroupMedium' 				,'SloDWGroupLarge' 				,'SloDWGroupXLarge' 				) 		JOIN map m11 ON a1.slots_used_staticrc70 = m11.slots_used 			AND m11.wg_name NOT IN ( 				'SloDWGroupSmall' 				,'SloDWGroupMedium' 				,'SloDWGroupLarge' 				,'SloDWGroupXLarge' 				) 		JOIN map m12 ON a1.slots_used_staticrc80 = m12.slots_used 			AND m12.wg_name NOT IN ( 				'SloDWGroupSmall' 				,'SloDWGroupMedium' 				,'SloDWGroupLarge' 				,'SloDWGroupXLarge' 				) 		WHERE a1.DWU = @DWU 		)  SELECT DWU 	,max_queries 	,max_slots 	,slots_used 	,wg_name 	,tgt_mem_grant_MB 	,up1 AS rc 	,( 		ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( 			PARTITION BY DWU ORDER BY DWU 			) 		) AS rc_id FROM ( 	SELECT DWU 		,max_queries 		,max_slots 		,slots_used 		,wg_name 		,tgt_mem_grant_MB 		,REVERSE(SUBSTRING(REVERSE(wg_names), 1, CHARINDEX('_', REVERSE(wg_names), 1) - 1)) AS up1 		,REVERSE(SUBSTRING(REVERSE(tgt_mem_grant_MBs), 1, CHARINDEX('_', REVERSE(tgt_mem_grant_MBs), 1) - 1)) AS up2 		,REVERSE(SUBSTRING(REVERSE(slots_used_all), 1, CHARINDEX('_', REVERSE(slots_used_all), 1) - 1)) AS up3 	FROM ref AS r1 	UNPIVOT(wg_name FOR wg_names IN ( 				wg_name_smallrc 				,wg_name_mediumrc 				,wg_name_largerc 				,wg_name_xlargerc 				,wg_name_staticrc10 				,wg_name_staticrc20 				,wg_name_staticrc30 				,wg_name_staticrc40 				,wg_name_staticrc50 				,wg_name_staticrc60 				,wg_name_staticrc70 				,wg_name_staticrc80 				)) AS r2 	UNPIVOT(tgt_mem_grant_MB FOR tgt_mem_grant_MBs IN ( 				tgt_mem_grant_MB_smallrc 				,tgt_mem_grant_MB_mediumrc 				,tgt_mem_grant_MB_largerc 				,tgt_mem_grant_MB_xlargerc 				,tgt_mem_grant_MB_staticrc10 				,tgt_mem_grant_MB_staticrc20 				,tgt_mem_grant_MB_staticrc30 				,tgt_mem_grant_MB_staticrc40 				,tgt_mem_grant_MB_staticrc50 				,tgt_mem_grant_MB_staticrc60 				,tgt_mem_grant_MB_staticrc70 				,tgt_mem_grant_MB_staticrc80 				)) AS r3 	UNPIVOT(slots_used FOR slots_used_all IN ( 				slots_used_smallrc 				,slots_used_mediumrc 				,slots_used_largerc 				,slots_used_xlargerc 				,slots_used_staticrc10 				,slots_used_staticrc20 				,slots_used_staticrc30 				,slots_used_staticrc40 				,slots_used_staticrc50 				,slots_used_staticrc60 				,slots_used_staticrc70 				,slots_used_staticrc80 				)) AS r4 	) a WHERE up1 = up2 	AND up1 = up3; WITH dmv AS ( 	SELECT rp.name AS rp_name 		,rp.max_memory_kb * 1.0 / 1048576 AS rp_max_mem_GB 		,(rp.max_memory_kb * 1.0 / 1024) * (request_max_memory_grant_percent / 100) AS max_memory_grant_MB 		,(rp.max_memory_kb * 1.0 / 1048576) * (request_max_memory_grant_percent / 100) AS max_memory_grant_GB 		,wg.name AS wg_name 		,wg.importance AS importance 		,wg.request_max_memory_grant_percent AS request_max_memory_grant_percent 	FROM sys.dm_pdw_nodes_resource_governor_workload_groups wg 	JOIN sys.dm_pdw_nodes_resource_governor_resource_pools rp ON wg.pdw_node_id = rp.pdw_node_id 		AND wg.pool_id = rp.pool_id 	WHERE rp.name = 'SloDWPool' 	GROUP BY rp.name 		,rp.max_memory_kb 		,wg.name 		,wg.importance 		,wg.request_max_memory_grant_percent 	) /* Creating resource class name mapping.*/ 	,NAMES AS ( 	SELECT 'smallrc' AS resource_class 		,1 AS rc_id 	 	UNION ALL 	 	SELECT 'mediumrc' 		,2 	 	UNION ALL 	 	SELECT 'largerc' 		,3 	 	UNION ALL 	 	SELECT 'xlargerc' 		,4 	 	UNION ALL 	 	SELECT 'staticrc10' 		,5 	 	UNION ALL 	 	SELECT 'staticrc20' 		,6 	 	UNION ALL 	 	SELECT 'staticrc30' 		,7 	 	UNION ALL 	 	SELECT 'staticrc40' 		,8 	 	UNION ALL 	 	SELECT 'staticrc50' 		,9 	 	UNION ALL 	 	SELECT 'staticrc60' 		,10 	 	UNION ALL 	 	SELECT 'staticrc70' 		,11 	 	UNION ALL 	 	SELECT 'staticrc80' 		,12 	) 	,base AS ( 	SELECT schema_name 		,table_name 		,SUM(column_count) AS column_count 		,CONVERT(BIGINT, ISNULL(SUM(short_string_column_count), 0)) AS short_string_column_count 		,CONVERT(BIGINT, ISNULL(SUM(long_string_column_count), 0)) AS long_string_column_count 	FROM ( 		SELECT sm.name AS schema_name 			,tb.name AS table_name 			,COUNT(co.column_id) AS column_count 			,CASE  				WHEN co.system_type_id IN ( 						36 						,43 						,106 						,108 						,165 						,167 						,173 						,175 						,231 						,239 						) 					AND co.max_length <= 32 					THEN COUNT(co.column_id) 				END AS short_string_column_count 			,CASE  				WHEN co.system_type_id IN ( 						165 						,167 						,173 						,175 						,231 						,239 						) 					AND co.max_length > 32 					AND co.max_length <= 8000 					THEN COUNT(co.column_id) 				END AS long_string_column_count 		FROM sys.schemas AS sm 		JOIN sys.tables AS tb ON sm.[schema_id] = tb.[schema_id] 		JOIN sys.columns AS co ON tb.[object_id] = co.[object_id] 		WHERE tb.name = CASE  				WHEN @TABLE_NAME IS NULL 					THEN tb.name 				ELSE @TABLE_NAME 				END 			AND sm.name = CASE  				WHEN @SCHEMA_NAME IS NULL 					THEN sm.name 				ELSE @SCHEMA_NAME 				END 		GROUP BY sm.name 			,tb.name 			,co.system_type_id 			,co.max_length 		) a 	GROUP BY schema_name 		,table_name 	) 	,size AS ( 	SELECT schema_name 		,table_name 		,75497472 AS table_overhead 		,column_count * 1048576 * 8 AS column_size 		,short_string_column_count * 1048576 * 32 AS short_string_size 		,long_string_column_count * 16777216 AS long_string_size 	FROM base 	 	UNION 	 	SELECT CASE  			WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 				THEN 'EMPTY' 			END AS schema_name 		,CASE  			WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 				THEN 'EMPTY' 			END AS table_name 		,CASE  			WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 				THEN 0 			END AS table_overhead 		,CASE  			WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 				THEN 0 			END AS column_size 		,CASE  			WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 				THEN 0 			END AS short_string_size 		,CASE  			WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 				THEN 0 			END AS long_string_size 	FROM base 	) 	,load_multiplier AS ( 	SELECT CASE  			WHEN FLOOR(8 * (CAST(CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(@DWU, 'DW', ''), 'c', '') AS INT) AS FLOAT) / 6000)) > 0 /*AND CHARINDEX(@DWU, 'c') = 0*/ 				AND CHARINDEX('c', @DWU) = 0 				THEN FLOOR(8 * (CAST(CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(@DWU, 'DW', ''), 'c', '') AS INT) AS FLOAT) / 6000)) 			ELSE 1 			END AS multiplication_factor 	) SELECT @Optmial_Resource_Class = MAX(closest_rc_in_increasing_order) FROM ( 	SELECT schema_name AS schema_name 		,table_name AS table_name 		,MIN(rc.resource_class) AS closest_rc_in_increasing_order 	FROM size AS s 		,load_multiplier 		,#ref r1 		,NAMES rc 	WHERE r1.rc_id = rc.rc_id 		AND rc.rc_id >= 5 /*only use static rc*/ 		AND r1.tgt_mem_grant_MB - CAST((table_overhead * 1.0 + column_size + short_string_size + long_string_size) * multiplication_factor / 1048576 AS DECIMAL(18, 2)) > 0 /*only get rc where we have enough memory*/ 		AND schema_name IS NOT NULL 		AND table_name IS NOT NULL 	GROUP BY schema_name 		,table_name 	) AS a;  DECLARE @TotalRowCount BIGINT;  SELECT @TotalRowCount = SUM(CONVERT(BIGINT, nps.[row_count])) FROM sys.schemas s JOIN sys.tables t ON s.[schema_id] = t.[schema_id] JOIN sys.indexes i ON t.[object_id] = i.[object_id] 	AND i.[index_id] <= 1 JOIN sys.pdw_table_distribution_properties tp ON t.[object_id] = tp.[object_id] JOIN sys.pdw_table_mappings tm ON t.[object_id] = tm.[object_id] JOIN sys.pdw_nodes_tables nt ON tm.[physical_name] = nt.[name] JOIN sys.dm_pdw_nodes pn ON nt.[pdw_node_id] = pn.[pdw_node_id] JOIN sys.pdw_distributions di ON nt.[distribution_id] = di.[distribution_id] JOIN ( 	SELECT [object_id] 		,[pdw_node_id] 		,[distribution_id] 		,SUM(row_count) AS row_count 	FROM ( 		SELECT [object_id] 			,[pdw_node_id] 			,[distribution_id] 			,MAX(row_count) AS row_count 		FROM sys.dm_pdw_nodes_db_partition_stats 		GROUP BY [object_id] 			,[pdw_node_id] 			,[distribution_id] 		) AS a 	GROUP BY [object_id] 		,[pdw_node_id] 		,[distribution_id] 	) AS nps ON nt.[object_id] = nps.[object_id] 	AND nt.[pdw_node_id] = nps.[pdw_node_id] 	AND nt.[distribution_id] = nps.[distribution_id] WHERE pn.[type] = 'COMPUTE' 	AND s.name = @SCHEMA_NAME 	AND t.name = @TABLE_NAME GROUP BY s.name 	,t.name;  SELECT CONCAT ( 		'User' 		,COALESCE(CASE  				WHEN REPLACE(@Optmial_Resource_Class, 'staticrc', '') < 80 					AND @TotalRowCount >= 60000000 					THEN CONCAT ( 							'staticrc' 							,REPLACE(@Optmial_Resource_Class, 'staticrc', '') + 10 							) 				WHEN @TotalRowCount < 60000000 					THEN 'staticrc10' 				ELSE @Optmial_Resource_Class 				END, 'staticrc80') 		) AS UserName

SqlCommandCreateStagingTable.defaultValue: IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tables') IS NOT NULL 	DROP TABLE #tables;  CREATE TABLE #tables ( 	SchemaName NVARCHAR(100) 	,TableName NVARCHAR(100) 	,FolderPath NVARCHAR(1000) 	);  INSERT INTO #tables VALUES ( 	'{SchemaNameStaging}' 	,'{TableNameStaging}' 	,'{FolderPathFull}' 	)  IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#CreateViewsDDL') IS NOT NULL 	DROP TABLE #CreateViewsDDL;  CREATE TABLE #CreateViewsDDL ( 	SchemaName NVARCHAR(100) 	,ViewName NVARCHAR(100) 	,ViewDDL NVARCHAR(MAX) 	);  DECLARE @cnt INT = 1 DECLARE @sqlCreateView NVARCHAR(MAX) DECLARE @SchemaName NVARCHAR(100) DECLARE @TableName NVARCHAR(100) DECLARE @FolderPath NVARCHAR(1000)  SELECT @SchemaName = SchemaName 	,@TableName = TableName 	,@FolderPath = FolderPath 	,@sqlCreateView = CONCAT ( 		'sp_describe_first_result_set @tsql=N''SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET(BULK ''''' 		,FolderPath 		,''''' , FORMAT=''''PARQUET'''') AS r''' 		) FROM #tables;  IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#InformationSchemaTempTable', 'U') IS NOT NULL 	DROP TABLE #InformationSchemaTempTable;  CREATE TABLE #InformationSchemaTempTable ( 	is_hidden BIT NOT NULL 	,column_ordinal INT NOT NULL 	,name SYSNAME NULL 	,is_nullable BIT NOT NULL 	,system_type_id INT NOT NULL 	,system_type_name NVARCHAR(256) NULL 	,max_length SMALLINT NOT NULL 	,precision TINYINT NOT NULL 	,scale TINYINT NOT NULL 	,collation_name SYSNAME NULL 	,user_type_id INT NULL 	,user_type_database SYSNAME NULL 	,user_type_schema SYSNAME NULL 	,user_type_name SYSNAME NULL 	,assembly_qualified_type_name NVARCHAR(4000) 	,xml_collection_id INT NULL 	,xml_collection_database SYSNAME NULL 	,xml_collection_schema SYSNAME NULL 	,xml_collection_name SYSNAME NULL 	,is_xml_document BIT NOT NULL 	,is_case_sensitive BIT NOT NULL 	,is_fixed_length_clr_type BIT NOT NULL 	,source_server SYSNAME NULL 	,source_database SYSNAME NULL 	,source_schema SYSNAME NULL 	,source_table SYSNAME NULL 	,source_column SYSNAME NULL 	,is_identity_column BIT NULL 	,is_part_of_unique_key BIT NULL 	,is_updateable BIT NULL 	,is_computed_column BIT NULL 	,is_sparse_column_set BIT NULL 	,ordinal_in_order_by_list SMALLINT NULL 	,order_by_list_length SMALLINT NULL 	,order_by_is_descending SMALLINT NULL 	,tds_type_id INT NOT NULL 	,tds_length INT NOT NULL 	,tds_collation_id INT NULL 	,tds_collation_sort_id TINYINT NULL 	);  INSERT INTO #InformationSchemaTempTable EXEC (@sqlCreateView) /*SELECT * FROM #InformationSchemaTempTable*/  DECLARE @GetMaxValueStatement NVARCHAR(MAX) DECLARE @GetColumnList NVARCHAR(MAX)  SELECT @GetMaxValueStatement = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(MAX), CONCAT ( 			'SELECT ' 			,STRING_AGG(ColumnMaxLength, ',') 			,' FROM OPENROWSET(BULK ''' 			,@FolderPath 			,''' , FORMAT=''PARQUET'') WITH (' 			,STRING_AGG(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(MAX), ColumnDatatypeWithMax), ',') 			,') AS r' 			)) 	,@GetColumnList = STRING_AGG(QUOTENAME([name]), ',') FROM ( 	SELECT CASE  			WHEN system_type_name LIKE ('%char%') 				OR system_type_name = 'varbinary(8000)' 				THEN CONCAT ( 						'CONVERT(BIGINT, COALESCE(NULLIF(MAX(DATALENGTH(' 						,QUOTENAME([name]) 						,')), 0), 1)) AS ' 						,QUOTENAME([name]) 						) 			ELSE CONCAT ( 					'COALESCE(CONVERT(BIGINT, SUM(0)), 0) AS ' 					,QUOTENAME([name]) 					) 			END AS ColumnMaxLength 		,CASE  			WHEN system_type_name LIKE ('%char%') 				THEN CONCAT ( 						QUOTENAME([name]) 						,' ' 						,REPLACE(system_type_name, '8000', 'MAX') 						,' COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8' 						) 			WHEN system_type_name = 'varbinary(8000)' 				THEN CONCAT ( 						QUOTENAME([name]) 						,' ' 						,REPLACE(system_type_name, '8000', 'MAX') 						) 			ELSE CONCAT ( 					QUOTENAME([name]) 					,' ' 					,system_type_name 					) 			END AS ColumnDatatypeWithMax 		,[name] 	FROM #InformationSchemaTempTable 	) AS a /*SELECT @GetMaxValueStatement*/ /*SELECT @GetColumnList*/  DECLARE @sqlUnpivot NVARCHAR(MAX)  SET @sqlUnpivot = CONCAT ( 		'SELECT ''' 		,@TableName 		,''' AS TABLE_NAME, unpvt.col AS COLUMN_NAME, CASE WHEN unpvt.datatype > 8000 THEN ''MAX'' ELSE CONVERT(NVARCHAR(100), unpvt.datatype) END AS DATATYPE_MAX FROM  ( ' 		,@GetMaxValueStatement 		,' ) AS a ' 		,CHAR(13) 		,' UNPIVOT ( datatype FOR col IN  ( ' 		,@GetColumnList 		,') ) AS unpvt' 		)  DROP TABLE  IF EXISTS #tmpBus; 	CREATE TABLE #tmpBus ( 		TABLE_CLEAN NVARCHAR(1000) 		,COLUMN_NAME NVARCHAR(1000) 		,DATATYPE_MAX NVARCHAR(1000) 		);  INSERT INTO #tmpBus EXEC (@sqlUnpivot)  DECLARE @createFinalView NVARCHAR(MAX) DECLARE @openrowsetValue NVARCHAR(MAX)  SELECT @createFinalView = CONCAT ( 		'CREATE TABLE ' 		,QUOTENAME(@SchemaName) 		,'.' 		,QUOTENAME(@TableName) 		,' (' 		,STRING_AGG(ColumnFullDefinition, ',') 		,') WITH ( DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN, HEAP)' 		) 	,@openrowsetValue = CONCAT ( 		'FROM OPENROWSET(BULK ''''' 		,@FolderPath 		,''''', FORMAT=''''PARQUET'''') WITH (' 		,STRING_AGG(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(MAX), ColumnFullDefinition), ',') 		) FROM ( 	SELECT @TableName AS table_name 		,c.[name] 		,UPPER(TYPE_NAME(c.system_type_id)) AS DataType 		,CONCAT ( 			QUOTENAME(c.[name]) 			,' ' 			,CASE  				WHEN TYPE_NAME(c.system_type_id) IN ( 						'int' 						,'bigint' 						,'smallint' 						,'tinyint' 						,'bit' 						,'decimal' 						,'numeric' 						,'float' 						,'real' 						,'datetime2' 						,'date' 						) 					THEN UPPER(c.system_type_name) 				ELSE CONCAT ( 						UPPER(TYPE_NAME(c.system_type_id)) 						,'(' 						,a.DATATYPE_MAX 						,') ' 						) 				END 			) AS ColumnFullDefinition 	FROM #InformationSchemaTempTable AS c 	JOIN #tmpBus AS a ON a.COLUMN_NAME = c.[name] 	ORDER BY column_ordinal OFFSET 0 ROWS 	) AS a /*SELECT @createFinalView*/ /*INSERT INTO #CreateViewsDDL*/  SELECT @SchemaName AS SchemaName 	,@TableName AS TableName 	,CONCAT ( 		'IF OBJECT_ID(''' 		,QUOTENAME(@SchemaName) 		,'.' 		,QUOTENAME(@TableName) 		,''', ''U'') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE ' 		,QUOTENAME(@SchemaName) 		,'.' 		,QUOTENAME(@TableName) 		,'; ' 		,@createFinalView 		,';' 		) AS CreateTableDDL;

CTAS.defaultValue: EXECUTE AS USER = '{ResourceClassName}'  DECLARE @SchemaNameStaging NVARCHAR(MAX) = '{SchemaNameStaging}' 	,@TableNameStaging NVARCHAR(MAX) = '{TableNameStaging}' 	,@TableNameFinal NVARCHAR(MAX) = '{TableNameFinal}' 	,@RowCount BIGINT 	,@TableDataSpaceGB DECIMAL(36, 2) 	,@ResourceClassName NVARCHAR(100) = '{ResourceClassName}';  WITH base AS ( 	SELECT s.name AS [schema_name] 		,t.name AS [table_name] 		,QUOTENAME(s.name) + '.' + QUOTENAME(t.name) AS [two_part_name] 		,tp.[distribution_policy_desc] AS [distribution_policy_name] 		,c.[name] AS [distribution_column] 		,i.[type_desc] AS [index_type_desc] 		,[reserved_page_count] AS reserved_space_page_count 		,[used_data] AS data_space_page_count 		,([reserved_page_count] - ([used_data] + ([reserved_page_count] - [used_page_count]))) AS index_space_page_count 		,([reserved_page_count] - [used_page_count]) AS unused_space_page_count 		,nps.[row_count] AS [row_count] 	FROM sys.schemas s 	JOIN sys.tables t ON s.[schema_id] = t.[schema_id] 	JOIN sys.indexes i ON t.[object_id] = i.[object_id] 		AND i.[index_id] <= 1 	JOIN sys.pdw_table_distribution_properties tp ON t.[object_id] = tp.[object_id] 	JOIN sys.pdw_table_mappings tm ON t.[object_id] = tm.[object_id] 	JOIN sys.pdw_nodes_tables nt ON tm.[physical_name] = nt.[name] 	JOIN sys.dm_pdw_nodes pn ON nt.[pdw_node_id] = pn.[pdw_node_id] 	JOIN sys.pdw_distributions di ON nt.[distribution_id] = di.[distribution_id] 	JOIN ( 		SELECT [object_id] 			,[pdw_node_id] 			,[distribution_id] 			,SUM(row_count) AS row_count 			,SUM([reserved_page_count]) AS [reserved_page_count] 			,SUM([used_data]) AS [used_data] 			,SUM([used_page_count]) AS [used_page_count] 		FROM ( 			SELECT [object_id] 				,[pdw_node_id] 				,[distribution_id] 				,MAX(row_count) AS row_count 				,SUM([reserved_page_count]) AS [reserved_page_count] 				,MAX([used_page_count]) AS [used_data] 				,SUM([used_page_count]) AS [used_page_count] 			FROM sys.dm_pdw_nodes_db_partition_stats 			GROUP BY [object_id] 				,[pdw_node_id] 				,[distribution_id] 			) AS a 		GROUP BY [object_id] 			,[pdw_node_id] 			,[distribution_id] 		) AS nps ON nt.[object_id] = nps.[object_id] 		AND nt.[pdw_node_id] = nps.[pdw_node_id] 		AND nt.[distribution_id] = nps.[distribution_id] 	LEFT JOIN ( 		SELECT * 		FROM sys.pdw_column_distribution_properties 		WHERE distribution_ordinal = 1 		) cdp ON t.[object_id] = cdp.[object_id] 	LEFT JOIN sys.columns c ON cdp.[object_id] = c.[object_id] 		AND cdp.[column_id] = c.[column_id] 	WHERE pn.[type] = 'COMPUTE' 		AND s.name = @SchemaNameStaging 		AND t.name = @TableNameStaging 	) 	,size AS ( 	SELECT [schema_name] 		,[table_name] 		,[distribution_policy_name] 		,[distribution_column] 		,[index_type_desc] 		,[index_space_page_count] 		,([reserved_space_page_count] * 8.0) / 1000000 AS [reserved_space_GB] 		,([unused_space_page_count] * 8.0) / 1000000 AS [unused_space_GB] 		,([data_space_page_count] * 8.0) / 1000000 AS [data_space_GB] 		,([index_space_page_count] * 8.0) / 1000000 AS [index_space_GB] 		,[row_count] AS row_count 	FROM base 	) SELECT @RowCount = SUM(row_count) /*AS [RowCount]*/ 	,@TableDataSpaceGB = SUM(data_space_GB) /*AS TableDataSpaceGB*/ FROM size GROUP BY schema_name 	,table_name 	,distribution_policy_name 	,distribution_column 	,index_type_desc ORDER BY schema_name 	,table_name 	,SUM(reserved_space_GB) DESC;/*SELECT @RowCount, @TableDataSpaceGB*/  DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(MAX) 	,@Distribution NVARCHAR(MAX) 	,@IndexType NVARCHAR(MAX)  SELECT @sql = sqlString FROM ( 	SELECT CONCAT ( 			'IF OBJECT_ID(''tempdb..#temp'') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp; CREATE TABLE #temp WITH (DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN, HEAP) AS  					SELECT 							* 							,CASE WHEN DataTypeName = ''int'' THEN 1 								WHEN DataTypeName IN (''numeric'', ''decimal'') AND ScaleValue = 0 THEN 1 								WHEN DataTypeName = ''bigint'' THEN 2 								WHEN DataTypeName = ''smallint'' THEN 2 								WHEN DataTypeName IN (''char'', ''varchar'', ''nvarchar'')  									THEN 										CASE WHEN CharacterLength <= 5 THEN 3 												WHEN CharacterLength <= 10 THEN 4 												WHEN CharacterLength <= 20 THEN 6 												WHEN CharacterLength <= 50 THEN 8 												ELSE 10 											END 								ELSE 10 								END 							+  							CASE WHEN NullCountPercentage < 0.01 THEN 1 								WHEN NullCountPercentage < 0.02 THEN 2 								WHEN NullCountPercentage < 0.03 THEN 3 								WHEN NullCountPercentage < 0.04 THEN 4 								WHEN NullCountPercentage < 0.05 THEN 5 								WHEN NullCountPercentage < 0.06 THEN 6 								WHEN NullCountPercentage < 0.07 THEN 7 								WHEN NullCountPercentage < 0.08 THEN 8 								WHEN NullCountPercentage < 0.09 THEN 9 								ELSE 10 								END 							+  							CASE WHEN UniqueValueCount > 60 AND UniqueValueCountPercentage > 0.000001 THEN 1 ELSE 3							END + RANK() OVER (ORDER BY NullCountPercentage ASC, CASE WHEN TableRowCount > 60000000 AND UniqueValueCount >= 600 THEN -1*UniqueValueCountPercentage ELSE UniqueValueCountPercentage END DESC, UniqueValueCount DESC, ABS(LEN(''' 			,@TableNameStaging 			,''') - LEN(ColName)))/10.0 							AS WeightedScore 						FROM 						( 							SELECT	* 									,NullCount/(NULLIF(TableRowCount, 0)*1.0) AS NullCountPercentage 									,UniqueValueCount/(NULLIF(TableRowCount, 0)*1.0) AS UniqueValueCountPercentage  							FROM (' 			,STRING_AGG(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(MAX), CONCAT ( 						'SELECT ''' 						,COLUMN_NAME 						,''' AS ColName, ''' 						,DATA_TYPE 						,''' AS DataTypeName 								,CASE  									  WHEN ''' 						,DATA_TYPE 						,''' IN (''varchar'', ''char'') THEN ''' 						,DATA_TYPE 						,''' + ''('' + CASE WHEN ' 						,COALESCE(CAST(CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH AS VARCHAR(10)), 'NULL') 						,' = -1 THEN ''max'' ELSE CAST(' 						,COALESCE(CAST(CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH AS VARCHAR(10)), 'NULL') 						,' AS VARCHAR(25)) END + '')''  									  WHEN ''' 						,DATA_TYPE 						,''' IN (''nvarchar'',''nchar'') THEN ''' 						,DATA_TYPE 						,''' + ''('' + CASE WHEN ' 						,COALESCE(CAST(CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH AS VARCHAR(10)), 'NULL') 						,' = -1 THEN ''max'' ELSE CAST(' 						,COALESCE(CAST(CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH AS VARCHAR(10)), 'NULL') 						,' / 2 AS VARCHAR(25)) END + '')''       									  WHEN ''' 						,DATA_TYPE 						,''' IN (''decimal'', ''numeric'') THEN ''' 						,DATA_TYPE 						,''' + ''('' + CAST(' 						,COALESCE(CAST(NUMERIC_PRECISION AS VARCHAR(10)), 'NULL') 						,' AS VARCHAR(25)) + '', '' + CAST(' 						,COALESCE(CAST(NUMERIC_SCALE AS VARCHAR(10)), 'NULL') 						,' AS VARCHAR(25)) + '')'' 									  WHEN ''' 						,DATA_TYPE 						,''' IN (''datetime2'') THEN ''' 						,DATA_TYPE 						,''' + ''('' + CAST(' 						,COALESCE(CAST(NUMERIC_SCALE AS VARCHAR(10)), 'NULL') 						,' AS VARCHAR(25)) + '')'' 									  ELSE ''' 						,DATA_TYPE 						,''' 									END AS DataTypeFull 								,' 						,COALESCE(CAST(CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH AS VARCHAR(10)), 'NULL') 						,' AS CharacterLength 								,' 						,COALESCE(CAST(NUMERIC_PRECISION AS VARCHAR(10)), 'NULL') 						,' AS PrecisionValue, ' 						,COALESCE(CAST(NUMERIC_SCALE AS VARCHAR(10)), 'NULL') 						,' AS ScaleValue 								,COUNT_BIG(DISTINCT ' 						,QUOTENAME(COLUMN_NAME) 						,') AS UniqueValueCount, COALESCE(SUM(CONVERT(BIGINT, CASE WHEN ' 						,QUOTENAME(COLUMN_NAME) 						,' IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)), CONVERT(BIGINT, 0)) AS NullCount  						 						,COALESCE(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(MAX), MIN(' 						,QUOTENAME(COLUMN_NAME) 						,')), '''') AS [MinValue] 						,COALESCE(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(MAX), MAX(' 						,QUOTENAME(COLUMN_NAME) 						,')), '''') AS [MaxValue] 						,COALESCE(MIN(DATALENGTH(' 						,QUOTENAME(COLUMN_NAME) 						,')), 0) AS [MinLength] 						,COALESCE(MAX(DATALENGTH(' 						,QUOTENAME(COLUMN_NAME) 						,')), 0) AS [MaxLength] 						 						 						,AVG(CASE WHEN ''' 						,DATA_TYPE 						,''' IN (''char'', ''varchar'', ''nvarchar'') THEN CONVERT(NUMERIC(30,2), NULL) ELSE ' 						,QUOTENAME(COLUMN_NAME) 						,' END) AS DataAverage 						 						,STDEVP(CASE WHEN ''' 						,DATA_TYPE 						,''' IN (''char'', ''varchar'', ''nvarchar'') THEN CONVERT(FLOAT, NULL) ELSE ' 						,QUOTENAME(COLUMN_NAME) 						,' END) AS DataStdevp						,' 						,@RowCount 						,' AS TableRowCount,' 						,@TableDataSpaceGB 						,' AS TableDataSpaceGB  								FROM ' 						,QUOTENAME(TABLE_SCHEMA) 						,'.' 						,QUOTENAME(TABLE_NAME) 						,'' 						)), ' UNION ') 			,') AS a) AS a' 			,' OPTION (LABEL = ''' 			,CONCAT ( 				'Data Profile - ' 				,QUOTENAME(@SchemaNameStaging) 				,'.' 				,QUOTENAME(@TableNameStaging) 				,' - {PipelineRunId}' 				) 			,''')' 			) AS sqlString 	FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS 	WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = @SchemaNameStaging 		AND TABLE_NAME = @TableNameStaging 		AND ( 			DATA_TYPE IN ( 				'int' 				,'bigint' 				,'char' 				,'varchar' 				,'nvarchar' 				) 			OR NUMERIC_SCALE = 0 			) /*AND COLUMN_NAME NOT LIKE '%date%' 		AND COLUMN_NAME NOT LIKE '%time%'*/ 	) AS a;/*SELECT @sql*/  EXEC (@sql);  INSERT INTO logging.DataProfile SELECT '{PipelineRunId}' AS PipelineRunId 	,'{PipelineStartDate}' AS PipelineStartDate 	,'{PipelineStartDateTime}' AS PipelineStartDateTime 	,@SchemaNameStaging AS SchemaName 	,@TableNameStaging AS TableName 	,ColName 	,DataTypeName 	,DataTypeFull 	,CharacterLength 	,PrecisionValue 	,ScaleValue 	,UniqueValueCount 	,NullCount 	,MinValue 	,MaxValue 	,MinLength 	,MaxLength 	,DataAverage 	,DataStdevp 	,TableRowCount 	,TableDataSpaceGB 	,WeightedScore 	,CONCAT ( 		@sql 		,'; SELECT * FROM #temp ORDER BY WeightedScore' 		) AS SqlCommandDataProfile 	,CONCAT ( 		'EXECUTE AS USER = ''' 		,@ResourceClassName 		,''' ' 		,'CREATE TABLE [' 		,@SchemaNameStaging 		,'].[' 		,@TableNameFinal 		,'_' 		,ColName 		,'] WITH (DISTRIBUTION = HASH(' 		,QUOTENAME(ColName) 		,'), CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX) AS SELECT * FROM [' 		,@SchemaNameStaging 		,'].[' 		,@TableNameFinal 		,'];' 		,' IF OBJECT_ID(''' 		,@SchemaNameStaging 		,'.' 		,@TableNameFinal 		,''', ''U'') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE [' 		,@SchemaNameStaging 		,'].[' 		,@TableNameFinal 		,'];' 		,' RENAME OBJECT [' 		,@SchemaNameStaging 		,'].[' 		,@TableNameFinal 		,'_' 		,ColName 		,'] TO [' 		,@TableNameFinal 		,'];' 		) AS SqlCommandCTAS 	,GETDATE() AS RowInsertDateTime FROM #temp;  IF @RowCount >= 60000000 BEGIN /*Run this if row count is greater than 60M and data size on disk is less that 2GB*/ 	SELECT @sql = 'SELECT TOP 1 @Distribution = CONCAT('' WITH ( DISTRIBUTION = HASH('', ColName, ''), CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX ) '') FROM #temp WHERE ColName NOT LIKE ''%date%'' AND ColName NOT LIKE ''%time%'' ORDER BY WeightedScore' 	FROM #temp 	WHERE ( 			ColName NOT LIKE '%time%' 			AND ColName NOT LIKE '%date%' 			) /*Will need to be tweaked*/  	EXEC sp_executesql @Query = @sql 		,@Params = N'@Distribution NVARCHAR(MAX) OUTPUT' 		,@Distribution = @Distribution OUTPUT END ELSE IF @RowCount < 60000000 	AND @TableDataSpaceGB > 2 BEGIN 	SELECT @sql = 'SELECT TOP 1 @Distribution = CONCAT('' WITH ( DISTRIBUTION = HASH('', ColName, ''), CLUSTERED INDEX('', ColName, '') ) '') FROM #temp ORDER BY WeightedScore' 	FROM #temp  	EXEC sp_executesql @Query = @sql 		,@Params = N'@Distribution NVARCHAR(MAX) OUTPUT' 		,@Distribution = @Distribution OUTPUT END ELSE BEGIN 	SELECT @sql = 'SELECT TOP 1 @Distribution = CONCAT('' WITH ( DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, CLUSTERED INDEX('', ColName, '') ) '') FROM #temp ORDER BY WeightedScore' 	FROM #temp  	EXEC sp_executesql @Query = @sql 		,@Params = N'@Distribution NVARCHAR(MAX) OUTPUT' 		,@Distribution = @Distribution OUTPUT END  SELECT @Distribution AS DistributionIndex;

sqlDelete.defaultValue: DECLARE @SchemaName NVARCHAR(1000) = '{SchemaName}' 	,@TableName NVARCHAR(1000) = '{TableName}' 	,@UserName NVARCHAR(1000) = '{UserName}' 	,@KeyColumns NVARCHAR(1000) = '{KeyColumns}' DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(MAX)  SELECT @sql = CONCAT ( 		'DELETE trg FROM ' 		,QUOTENAME(@SchemaName) 		,'.' 		,QUOTENAME(@TableName) 		,' AS trg JOIN ' 		,QUOTENAME(@SchemaName) 		,'.[' 		,@TableName 		,'_delete] AS src ON ' 		,( 			SELECT STRING_AGG(CONCAT ( 						'trg.' 						,TRIM(value) 						,' = ' 						,'src.' 						,TRIM(value) 						), ' AND ') 			FROM STRING_SPLIT(@KeyColumns, ',') 			) 		);  PRINT (@sql);  EXEC (@sql);

sqlUpdate.defaultValue: DECLARE @SchemaName NVARCHAR(1000) = '{SchemaName}' 	,@TableName NVARCHAR(1000) = '{TableName}' 	,@UserName NVARCHAR(1000) = '{UserName}' 	,@KeyColumns NVARCHAR(1000) = '{KeyColumns}' DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(MAX)  SET @sql = ( 		SELECT CONCAT ( 				'EXECUTE AS user = ''' 				,@UserName 				,''' UPDATE trg SET ' 				,STRING_AGG(CASE  						WHEN IsKeyColumnFlag = 0 							THEN CONCAT ( 									QUOTENAME(COLUMN_NAME) 									,' = src.' 									,QUOTENAME(COLUMN_NAME) 									) 						ELSE NULL 						END, ',') 				,' FROM ' 				,QUOTENAME(TABLE_SCHEMA) 				,'.' 				,QUOTENAME(TABLE_NAME) 				,' AS trg' 				,' JOIN ' 				,QUOTENAME(TABLE_SCHEMA) 				,'.[' 				,TABLE_NAME 				,'_update] AS src' 				,' ON ' 				,( 					SELECT STRING_AGG(CONCAT ( 								'trg.' 								,value 								,' = ' 								,'src.' 								,value 								), ' AND ') 					FROM STRING_SPLIT(@KeyColumns, ',') 					) 				) 		FROM ( 			SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA 				,TABLE_NAME 				,COLUMN_NAME 				,CASE  					WHEN COLUMN_NAME IN ( 							SELECT TRIM(value) 							FROM STRING_SPLIT(@KeyColumns, ',') 							) 						THEN 1 					ELSE 0 					END IsKeyColumnFlag 			FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS 			WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = @SchemaName 				AND TABLE_NAME = @TableName 			) AS a 		GROUP BY TABLE_SCHEMA 			,TABLE_NAME 		)  PRINT (@sql);  EXEC (@sql);

sqlInsert.defaultValue: DECLARE @SchemaName NVARCHAR(1000) = '{SchemaName}' 	,@TableName NVARCHAR(1000) = '{TableName}' 	,@UserName NVARCHAR(1000) = '{UserName}' DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(MAX)  SET @sql = ( SELECT CONCAT ( 		'EXECUTE AS user = ''' 		,@UserName 		,''' INSERT INTO ' 		,QUOTENAME(TABLE_SCHEMA) 		,'.' 		,QUOTENAME(TABLE_NAME) 		,' (' 		,STRING_AGG(QUOTENAME(COLUMN_NAME), ',') 		,')' 		,' SELECT ' 		,STRING_AGG(QUOTENAME(COLUMN_NAME), ',') 		,' FROM ' 		,QUOTENAME(TABLE_SCHEMA) 		,'.[' 		,TABLE_NAME 		,'_insert]' 		) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = @SchemaName 	AND TABLE_NAME = @TableName GROUP BY TABLE_SCHEMA 	,TABLE_NAME )  PRINT (@sql);  EXEC (@sql);

sqlAlterColumn.defaultValue: DECLARE @SchemaName NVARCHAR(1000) = '{SchemaName}' 	,@TableNameBase NVARCHAR(1000) = '{TableNameBase}' 	,@TableNameStage NVARCHAR(1000) = '{TableNameStage}' DECLARE @sqlUpdateColumn NVARCHAR(MAX) 	,@sqlAddColumn NVARCHAR(MAX) 	,@sqlDropColumn NVARCHAR(MAX);  WITH cteBase AS ( 	SELECT s.[name] AS SchemaName 		,t.[name] AS TableName 		,c.[name] AS ColumnName 		,CASE  			WHEN tp.[name] IN ( 					'varchar' 					,'char' 					) 				THEN tp.[name] + '(' + CASE  						WHEN c.max_length = - 1 							THEN 'max' 						ELSE CAST(c.max_length AS VARCHAR(25)) 						END + ')' 			WHEN tp.[name] IN ( 					'nvarchar' 					,'nchar' 					) 				THEN tp.[name] + '(' + CASE  						WHEN c.max_length = - 1 							THEN 'max' 						ELSE CAST(c.max_length / 2 AS VARCHAR(25)) 						END + ')' 			WHEN tp.[name] IN ( 					'decimal' 					,'numeric' 					) 				THEN tp.[name] + '(' + CAST(c.[precision] AS VARCHAR(25)) + ', ' + CAST(c.[scale] AS VARCHAR(25)) + ')' 			WHEN tp.[name] IN ('datetime2') 				THEN tp.[name] + '(' + CAST(c.[scale] AS VARCHAR(25)) + ')' 			ELSE tp.[name] 			END AS DataTypeFull 		,tp.[name] AS [RawType] 		,c.max_length AS [MaxLength] 		,c.[precision] AS [Precision] 		,c.scale AS [Scale] 	FROM sys.tables t 	JOIN sys.schemas s ON t.schema_id = s.schema_id 	JOIN sys.columns c ON t.object_id = c.object_id 	JOIN sys.types tp ON c.user_type_id = tp.user_type_id 	WHERE s.[name] = @SchemaName 		AND t.[name] = @TableNameBase 	) 	,cteStage AS ( 	SELECT s.[name] AS SchemaName 		,t.[name] AS TableName 		,c.[name] AS ColumnName 		,CASE  			WHEN tp.[name] IN ( 					'varchar' 					,'char' 					) 				THEN tp.[name] + '(' + CASE  						WHEN c.max_length = - 1 							THEN 'max' 						ELSE CAST(c.max_length AS VARCHAR(25)) 						END + ')' 			WHEN tp.[name] IN ( 					'nvarchar' 					,'nchar' 					) 				THEN tp.[name] + '(' + CASE  						WHEN c.max_length = - 1 							THEN 'max' 						ELSE CAST(c.max_length / 2 AS VARCHAR(25)) 						END + ')' 			WHEN tp.[name] IN ( 					'decimal' 					,'numeric' 					) 				THEN tp.[name] + '(' + CAST(c.[precision] AS VARCHAR(25)) + ', ' + CAST(c.[scale] AS VARCHAR(25)) + ')' 			WHEN tp.[name] IN ('datetime2') 				THEN tp.[name] + '(' + CAST(c.[scale] AS VARCHAR(25)) + ')' 			ELSE tp.[name] 			END AS DataTypeFull 		,tp.[name] AS [RawType] 		,c.max_length AS [MaxLength] 		,c.[precision] AS [Precision] 		,c.scale AS [Scale] 	FROM sys.tables t 	JOIN sys.schemas s ON t.schema_id = s.schema_id 	JOIN sys.columns c ON t.object_id = c.object_id 	JOIN sys.types tp ON c.user_type_id = tp.user_type_id 	WHERE s.[name] = @SchemaName 		AND t.[name] = @TableNameStage 	) SELECT @sqlUpdateColumn = CONCAT ( 		'EXECUTE AS USER = ''Userstaticrc10''; ' 		,STRING_AGG(CASE  				WHEN s.DataTypeFull <> b.DataTypeFull 					AND s.MaxLength > b.MaxLength 					THEN CONCAT ( 							'ALTER TABLE ' 							,QUOTENAME(b.SchemaName) 							,'.' 							,QUOTENAME(b.TableName) 							,' ALTER COLUMN ' 							,QUOTENAME(s.ColumnName) 							,' ' 							,s.DataTypeFull 							,';' 							) 				ELSE NULL 				END, ' ') 		) 	,@sqlAddColumn = CONCAT ( 		'EXECUTE AS USER = ''Userstaticrc10''; ' 		,STRING_AGG(CASE  				WHEN b.ColumnName IS NULL 					THEN CONCAT ( 							'ALTER TABLE ' 							,QUOTENAME(s.SchemaName) 							,'.' 							,QUOTENAME(@TableNameBase) 							,' ADD ' 							,QUOTENAME(s.ColumnName) 							,' ' 							,s.DataTypeFull 							,';' 							) 				ELSE NULL 				END, ' ') 		) 	,@sqlDropColumn = CONCAT ( 		'EXECUTE AS USER = ''Userstaticrc10''; ' 		,STRING_AGG(CASE  				WHEN s.ColumnName IS NULL 					THEN CONCAT ( 							'ALTER TABLE ' 							,QUOTENAME(b.SchemaName) 							,'.' 							,QUOTENAME(b.TableName) 							,' DROP COLUMN ' 							,QUOTENAME(b.ColumnName) 							,';' 							) 				ELSE NULL 				END, ' ') 		) FROM cteBase AS b FULL JOIN cteStage AS s ON s.ColumnName = b.ColumnName;  PRINT (@sqlUpdateColumn); PRINT (@sqlAddColumn); PRINT (@sqlDropColumn);  EXEC (@sqlUpdateColumn); EXEC (@sqlAddColumn);  EXEC (@sqlDropColumn)
